definition: located at or near the back of an animal, put at a disadvantage
details:
adjective
- located at or near the back of an animal
= synonyms: back
verb
- put at a disadvantage
= example: put at a disadvantage
= synonyms: hamper
- be a hindrance or obstacle to
= synonyms: impede
- hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of
= synonyms: block
